description: React component for an AI quiz modal interface, handling quiz generation, answering, submission, and displaying results.

methods.name: AiQuizModal
methods.description: Main React component for the AI quiz modal, managing quiz state, user interactions, and rendering UI.

methods.name: handleStart
methods.description: Starts the quiz by generating questions based on selected difficulty.

methods.name: handleAnswer
methods.description: Records user's answer for the current question.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Submits the quiz answers and displays results.

methods.name: handleClose
methods.description: Resets state and closes the modal.
